Params.description: Params define Consumer-selectable BTC staking parameters

btc_network.description: `btc_network` is the network the BTC staking protocol is running on

covenant_pks.description: `covenant_pks` is the list of public keys held by the covenant committee each PK follows encoding in BIP-340 spec on Bitcoin

covenant_quorum.description: `covenant_quorum` is the minimum number of signatures needed for the covenant multi-signature

min_slashing_tx_fee_sat.description: `min_slashing_tx_fee_sat` is the minimum amount of tx fee (quantified in Satoshi) needed for the pre-signed slashing tx

slashing_pk_script.description: `slashing_pk_script` is the pk script that the slashed BTC goes to. The pk script is in string format on Bitcoin.

slashing_rate.description: `slashing_rate` determines the portion of the staked amount to be slashed, expressed as a decimal (e.g. 0.5 for 50%).
